- 2 -
Mr. William G. Harley
October 2li, I960
Whatever your feeling, please know I will be happy to
continue in present capacity, or to accept any other
assignment you feel might be more useful to NAEB.
It was a great convention!
Regards,
Richard F. Vogl
Chairman,
Radio Network Committee
RFV:ah
cc: Mr. Robert E. Underwood, Jr.
